steps.name: When I find and click on "Esquel Sofa"
Then I validate the product title
And I check if "Esquel Sofa" is sold out

steps.name: Then I validate the product description
And I validate the product price
When I click on the wishlist icon
And I navigate to the wishlist page
Then I validate that "Esquel Sofa" is added to the wishlist
And I click on the product from the wishlist
When I click on the "Add to Cart" button
Then I validate that "Esquel Sofa" is added to the cart
